<where> <if test="id != null"> AND id=#{id} </if> <if test="state != null"> AND SUBSTRING(flag, 1, 1)=#{state} </if> <if test="catgs != null"> AND catg IN <foreach item="itm" index="idx" collection="catgs" open="(" separator="," close=")">#{itm}</foreach> </if> <if test="title != null"> AND title LIKE #{title} </if> </where>
<where> <if test="catgs != null"> AND catg IN <foreach item="itm" index="idx" collection="catgs" open="(" separator="," close=")">#{itm}</foreach> </if> </where>

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE atom_topic SET flag=?, catg=?, link_url=?, media_url=?, title=?, summary=?, content=? WHERE id=?
operation.sqlmap: UPDATE atom_topic SET flag=#{flag}, catg=#{catg}, link_url=#{linkUrl}, media_url=#{mediaUrl}, title=#{title}, summary=#{summary}, content=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modify=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}

operation.name: updateVisit
operation.sql: UPDATE atom_topic SET visit_cnt='visit+1', gmt_modify='NOW' WHERE id='1'
operation.sqlmap: UPDATE atom_topic SET visit_cnt=visit_cnt+#{count}, gmt_modify=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}

operation.name: updateReply
operation.sql: UPDATE atom_topic SET reply_cnt='reply+1', gmt_modify='NOW' WHERE id='1'
operation.sqlmap: UPDATE atom_topic SET reply_cnt=reply_cnt+#{count}, gmt_modify=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
